alert.note: Alert for Garfield; Logan; Noble; Payne (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 10 at 4:14AM CDT until June 10 at 5:15AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Noble County in northern Oklahoma... Northern Logan County in central Oklahoma... Payne County in central Oklahoma... Eastern Garfield County in northern Oklahoma... * Until 515 AM CDT. * At 413 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 9 miles west of Ralston to 3 miles north of Garber, moving southeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...The Blackwell Mesonet measured a 70 mph wind gust. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Stillwater, Cushing, Perry, Perkins, Langston, Yale, Garber, Morrison, Glencoe, Covington, Billings, Ripley, Coyle, Red Rock, Mulhall, Marland, Hunter, Orlando, Lake Mcmurtry and Quay. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
